explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a white shirt, red shorts, and a black helmet stands beneath a soccer goalpost. Hanging from the crossbar at varying heights are three objects: a 2-meter-tall kettlebell, a 1.7-meter-tall soccer ball, and a 1.5-meter-tall tennis ball. At the top of the screen, black text on a white background reads "MAN," "BOY," "ALEX," and "KID" from left to right. Green trees are visible in the distance.
[0-2] The man in the white shirt walks to the 1.5-meter tennis ball and headbutts it. The word "MAN" above turns to a green background.
